mapper.select:
select t1.id, t1.name, t1.phone, t1.gender, t1.age, t1.wechat, t1.qq, t1.subject, t1.course_id, t1.degree, t1.job_status, t1.channel, t1.remark, t1.status, t1.user_id, t1.clue_id, t1.next_time, t1.create_time, t1.update_time, t2.name as assign_name from business t1 left join user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.id
and t1.id = #{bizQueryDTO.businessId}
and t1.name like concat('%', #{bizQueryDTO.name}, '%')
and t1.phone like concat('%', #{bizQueryDTO.phone}, '%')
and t2.name like concat('%', #{bizQueryDTO.assignName}, '%')
and t1.status = #{bizQueryDTO.status}
and t1.status in (1, 2, 3)
order by t1.update_time desc
